product_name: Sony Sony Action Cam Water Resistant Carrying Case
long_description: Carry and protect your wearable camcorder and accessories (sold separately) in style with the water-resistant Sony Action Cam carrying case. Toss it in your bag and head out to your next adventure. Compact design is fully equipped with pockets and straps on both sides of the interior, so everything stays secure. Two-way zipper secures the tough polyurethane case panels.
short_description: Carry and protect your wearable camcorder and accessories (sold separately) in style with the water-resistant Sony Action Cam carrying case. Toss it in your bag and head out to your next adventure.
